H0.text: In which city was John Lennon murdered. London

H1.text: In which city was John Lennon murdered. Los Angeles

H2.text: In which city was John Lennon murdered. Chicago

H3.text: In which city was John Lennon murdered. Ny

A4.text: Lennon was rushed in a police cruiser to the emergency room of Roosevelt Hospital, where he was pronounced dead on arrival at 11:15 p.m. (EST); he was 40 years old.

A5.text: He was shot and killed by Mark David Chapman, three weeks after the album's release.

A6.text: The murder occurred near the Dakota in New York.

A7.text: The scene of the shooting was in Central Park, near the Dakota in New York.
